hero.title: Hey, I'm Thierry Aplogan Full Stack Developer
hero.description: I transform ideas into performant web and mobile applications. Based in Benin, I create digital solutions that make users' lives easier.

about.title: About
about.description:
Full-stack dev with 3+ years of experience, I transform ideas into concrete and performant applications.

I focus on understanding the real problem, simplifying processes, and delivering solutions that truly make users' daily lives easier. No over-engineering, just clean and efficient code that meets the need.

page.title: About me
page.description: Discover my journey, from a curious student to my first lines of code, becoming a full-stack developer passionate about building web and mobile applications.
page.intro:
Hi! I'm Thierry Aplogan, a full-stack developer based in Benin. I have a classic software engineer background: solid academic training, concrete professional experiences, and a growing passion for code.

What sets me apart? I don't just write code that works. I seek to solve real problems, simplify processes, and create solutions that truly make users' lives easier.
page.vision:
I see development as a problem-solving tool, not an end in itself. My goal is to create simple, efficient, and maintainable solutions that meet users' real needs.

AI particularly interests me. Beyond the daily use of tools like GitHub Copilot or ChatGPT, I'm looking to deepen my knowledge in this area.

My philosophy remains simple: solve real problems with effective solutions.

description: Challenge: improve the mobile insurance subscription experience
Solution developed: OCR for automatic data extraction
Team of 4 (2 designers, 2 devs) - Role: Backend Dev

items.quote: Thierry transformed our vision into a robust and modern web application. His technical expertise in Vue.js and Django allowed us to launch our platform in record time. He truly understands business needs and proposes pragmatic solutions.

The medical management application developed by Thierry has significantly improved our efficiency. Intuitive interface, excellent performance, and patient tracking that perfectly meets our needs. A reliable and attentive professional.

Working with Thierry was a real pleasure. He successfully translated our mockups into a performant and elegant Flutter application. His use of AI tools like GitHub Copilot allows for impressive productivity without sacrificing quality.

techStack.title: Tech Stack
techStack.description: Technologies I use daily to build performant solutions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to common questions about my services and process.

questions.label: What types of projects do you work on?
questions.content: I specialize in developing modern web applications (Vue.js, Nuxt, React, Next.js), cross-platform mobile applications (Flutter), and robust backends (Django, FastAPI, Laravel). I can handle a project from A to Z or work on specific needs.

questions.label: How does your development process work?
questions.content: My process is collaborative and iterative: needs analysis, technical design, development with regular reviews, thorough testing, then deployment. I adapt my method according to the size and constraints of the project.

questions.label: Do you work with startups?
questions.content: Absolutely! I particularly enjoy helping startups bring their product vision to life. I know how to adapt to the fast pace and frequent pivots while keeping the code maintainable for future growth.

questions.label: Do you use AI in your work?
questions.content: Yes, I integrate AI tools like GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT, and Gemini to increase my productivity by 30-40%. This allows me to focus on architecture and business logic while speeding up repetitive tasks.

questions.label: How do you bill for projects?
questions.content: I offer two billing methods: fixed price for projects with a well-defined scope, or time and materials (daily/hourly) for ongoing missions or evolving needs.

questions.label: What is your daily rate?
questions.content: My daily rate varies according to the complexity of the project, the technologies involved, and the duration of the mission. Contact me for a personalized quote.

questions.label: How long does a typical project take?
questions.content: It depends greatly on the scope. A landing page can take 1-2 weeks, a complete web application 2-4 months, and a mobile app with backend 3-6 months.

questions.label: Do you offer maintenance after delivery?
questions.content: Yes, I offer maintenance contracts and ongoing support tailored to your needs. Whether for bug fixes, functional evolutions, or optimization.

questions.label: Where are you based?
questions.content: I'm based in Benin and work primarily remotely with clients around the world. I'm flexible with schedules and can adapt to your timezone.

questions.label: What are your favorite tech stacks?
questions.content: For web, I love working with Vue.js/Nuxt or React/Next.js on the frontend, and Django or FastAPI on the backend. For mobile, I favor Flutter. I use Tailwind CSS for styling.

questions.label: Why did you become a developer?
questions.content: I love taking on the challenge of solving complex problems through code and technology. It's incredibly rewarding to see users interact with something I've created.

questions.label: What do you do outside of coding?
questions.content: Outside of dev, I'm passionate about music and video games. I also enjoy discovering and testing new tools to improve my productivity.
